name: Stickfin's Space Shooter
description:
Stickfin's Space Shooter! Just tap those blasted UFOs and they are done for!

Stickfin's Space Shooter is a simple game I decided I'd develop for fun. I hope you have as much fun playing as I did creating!

Note Worthy Features

  • You'll have endless fun in Free Play! Try to get the most waves beaten in one sitting!
  • Create the level of your dreams with the Level Editor! Just adjust, test, and compile it all together!
  • Play others' levels in the Custom Levels mode! To know who exactly was behind that cool level, try deciphering the user ID!

What are you waiting for? Download now!
